name: Herding Hounds
description:
In Herding Hounds you play as a Shepard's dog harvesting sheep by herding them to the exit of the field. 

## Game Play

You have limited time to harvest sheep but each successful harvest will add more time to the clock. Each sheep will add 2 seconds to the play time. Sheep are also worth points equal to the time remaining on the board.

## Controls 

Your Dog is controlled by clicking on the screen

Scroll wheel to zoom in and out

Double Click to Bark :)

## Tips

* Sheep are worth more with more time on the clock, so Harvest sheep early and often!

* It is easier to herd sheep in smaller groups than it is pushing large piles of sheep
